t: Amazon expands in the Middle East with amazon.ae - Bizon
s: April 12, 2024 - Amazon confirmed on Wednesday its interest in the growth of the online sales market in the Middle East, with the announcement of the launch of Amazon.ae, a website developed entirely in Arabic in the United Arab Emirates, under the Amazon brand.
